mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_ID, MEMBER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE_CREATED, NOTICE_TYPE) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{noticeType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent}, NOTICE_DATE_CREATED = SYSDATE, NOTICE_TYPE = #{noticeType} WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
